articles.author: Katherine Lawton
articles.title: Elon Musk taunts critics by lighting up Twitter X logo on San Fran HQ - Daily Mail
articles.description: Posting on Twitter today, the Tesla founder posted a video of the X sign illuminating the sky as it made its way on top of the Twitter building in San Francisco.
articles.content:
Elon Musk has taunted critics by lighting up Twitter's new X logo on top of the company's headquarters in San Francisco.
